title: Portfolio Photography Service
content:
Hi all,

As things are really slowing down with my freelance work, I am pondering on offering portfolio photography services as a side gig. My question to you is what would you expect the service to cost? I am thinking a flat fee for photography, clean-up, and resizing 12 pieces with color correction and isolation as extras. What do you think?

Below are some samples that I shot for my own portfolio.

Any input is much appreciated, thanks!

Ace
